registers.name: PDCLKDIS
registers.info: Power Domain Clock Disable Register

fields.info: Read in User and Privileged Mode returns the current value of PDCLK_DIS[3].
Read in User and Privileged Mode returns the current value of PDCLK_DIS[2].
ead in User and Privileged Mode returns the current value of PDCLK_DIS[1].
Read in User and Privileged Mode returns the current value of PDCLK_DIS[0].

registers.name: PDCLKDISSET
registers.info: Power Domain Clock Disable Set Register

fields.info: Read in User and Privileged Mode returns the current value of PDCLK_DISSET[3].
Privileged Mode only.
Read in User and Privileged Mode returns the current value of PDCLK_DISSET[1].
Read in User and Privileged Mode returns the current value of PDCLK_DISSET[0].

registers.name: PDCLKDISCLR
registers.info: Power Domain Clock Disable Clear Register

fields.info: PDCLK_DISCLR[3]
Read in User and Privileged Mode returns the current value of PDCLK_DIS[2].
Read in User and Privileged Mode returns the current value of PDCLK_DIS[1].
Read in User and Privileged Mode returns the current value of PDCLK_DIS[0].
